System wrapper for Vexriscv Veronica RISCV ps.

Ports
tck
`ifdef _JTAG_IO input

JTAG

tms
input`ifdef _JTAG_IO input

JTAG

tdi
input`ifdef _JTAG_IO input

JTAG

tdo
output`ifdef _JTAG_IO input

JTAG

clk
output`endif input

Master Input Clock

resetn
input`endif input

Master Reset Input

ddr2_addr
inout [12:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_ba
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_cas_n
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_ck_n
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_ck_p
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_cke
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_cs_n
inout [2:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_dm
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_dq
inout [15:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_dqs_n
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_dqs_p
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_odt
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_ras_n
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_reset_n
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

ddr2_we_n
inout [1:0]

DDR interface

leds
output [15:0]

board leds

slide_switches
input [15:0]

board slide switches

ftdi_tx
input [15:0]

FTDI UART TX

ftdi_rx
output [15:0]

FTDI UART RX

ftdi_rts
input [15:0]

FTDI UART RTS

ftdi_cts
output [15:0]

FTDI UART CTS

sd_spi_miso
input [15:0]

SD CARD Master In Master Out SPI

sd_spi_mosi
output [15:0]

SD CARD Master Out Master In SPI

sd_spi_csn
output [15:0]

SD CARD Chip Select SPI

sd_spi_sclk
output [15:0]

SD CARD clock SPI

inst_clk_wiz_1

Generate system clocks

inst_ddr_rstgen

Generate DDR Reset

inst_sys_rstgen

Generate general system resets

inst_cpu_rstgen

Generate general system resets

inst_axi_ddr_ctrl

AXI DDR Controller, 200 MHz in for 50 Mhz out (200/4 = 50).

inst_system_ps_wrapper

Wraps all of the RISCV CPU core and its devices.
